void uart_init (  void   ) 
 

Initialize UART

int uart_write (  uint8_t *const   str,
int  len
) 
 

Copies a string into a buffer for the Uart interrupt handler to write to the terminal. If overflow occurs, older data is overwritten.

Parameters:
str The string you want to send to the UART hyperterminal.
len length of the string
Returns:
-1 if overflow occurred.
